EMPLOYMENT	DETAILS
Amiantit	Fiberglass	Industries	Limited
Designation:	Quality	Control	Engineer	(Piping)	&	SAP
Coordinator
Duration:
	Since	Jun'14-Jun'16
Responsibilities:
Responsible	for	the	raw	material	incoming	inspection,	online	manufacturing	inspection	to	final	inspection	of
the	product	like	i.e.	GRP,	GRE	pipes	and	GRP-UG/AG	underground	fuel	tanks.
Implementing	quality	control	plans	and	procedures	to	provide	the	most	efficient	and	effective	production	of
FRP	PIPES.
Managing	laboratory	activities	on	a	day	to	day	basis,	reporting	directly	to	the	head	of	the	department	of	QA/QC.
Responsible	for	raw	materials	and	full	scale	testing	mentoring	and	scheduling	of	staff.
Inspection	and	testing	of	all	type	incoming	Raw	materials	(like	Glass,	Resin	and	Sand)	and	maintaining	the
respective	document.
Reviews	the	quality	control	test	result	on	a	daily	basis	and	ensure	that	the	quality	control	plan	is	properly
implemented.
Updated	Calibration	of	all	type	of	measuring	and	testing	equipment	and	instruments	by	internal	and	external
Independent	laboratories.
Issuance	of	request	for	inspection	for	client	and	coordinate	with	the	department	concern.
Planning	and	coordinating	QA/QC	activities	,	ensuring	quality	control	of	the	work	according	to	the	customer
requirements.
Inspecting	CURING	OF	JOINTS	for	Thermo	setting	process.
Witnessing	HYDROTEST	of	FRP	PIPES.Dimensional	inspection	of	storage	tanks.
Witnessing	dimensional	inspection	of	FRP	PIPES.
